titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to clarify the application of the Whistleblower Protection Act of 1989 to certain personnel matters of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3280-3281)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/19/1993--Introduced. Applies certain protections and remedies under the Whistleblower Protection Act of 1989 to current and former health care employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
